reviews.text: This is a gay only hotel on Rue De La Buffa in Nice. It is a small hotel with roughly 10/11 rooms spread over three floors. It is new, opened in December 1st last year and is run by two lovely guys. I stayed there for four night over the August Bank holiday review and would rate this above average.
